Author: JuBelen
Text: I think you should go even if you are not in recovery, you would feel better. Take care of yourself.

Author: ridingthecurve
Text: i have eczema, i think if you don't want to go to a dermatologist what you can do is at least moisturize your hands.   find a fragrance free heavy duty moisturizer like vanicream or cerave, and then at night you can layer vaseline on top as an occlusive. if they're really inflamed get those otc steroid creams, but they really shouldn't be used for a long period of time.   make sure they don't get infected too, once it starts 'weeping' clear/yellowish fluid you should go to a dr
